# Provision of Professional Stunt-actors and/or Certified Instructor’s for Use of Force Scenario Based Training

## Tender Notice

* **Procurement Reference Number**: PW-23-01021586
* **Solicitation Number**: 1000411204A
* **Publication Date**: January 19, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 3, 2023, 14:00:00

## Tenders Description

The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) is advertising for proposals to provide professional stunt-actors and/or certified use of force instructor’s to participate in training scenarios at the CBSA training facility in Rigaud, Quebec.

The successful bidder will be expected to provide qualified professionals to participate in use of force scenarios involving Border Services Officers (BSOs) and recruits. Scenarios will be conducted in a controlled environment at the training facility.

The requirements for the project can be downloaded from the Canada Buys website along with the solicitation document (RFQ).

## Contact Information

Inquiries regarding this solicitation should be directed to:

*   **Contracting Officer**: Marie-France Chrétien
*   **Contact Information**: 355 North River Road, 17th Floor, Tower B, Ottawa, ON K1A 0L8
*   **Phone**: 514-210-5405
*   **Email**: [Marye-France Chrétien@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca](mailto:marie-france.chretien@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca)

## Trade Agreements

This solicitation may be subject to one or more of the following trade agreements: Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement, and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

## Note

All respondents to the solicitation must obtain a copy of the solicitation document and any subsequent amendments, from the Canada Buys website. It is the responsibility of the respondent to verify the contents of the solicitation document prior to submitting a proposal.  Deadline and conditions in this invitation to tender will be subject neither to waiver nor exception. The CBSA reserves the right to accept or reject any or all proposals.

The solicitation document is available on the Canada Buys website.
